page.title: 17EDUCATION IN MELBOURNE
page.content: EDUCATION IN MELBOURNE RANGES FROM 3 TO 103!PLAYGROUP IS HELD IN THE YOUTH CENTRE EVERY MORNING AND THERE ARE 3 STAFF,2 HELPERS AND AN ANCILLARY WORKER TO LOOK AFTER AN AVERAGE OF 21 CHILDREN.THE PUPILS AT THE INFANT SCHOOL RANGE FROM 4 TO 7 YEARS.THERE ARE 5 TEACHERS FOR 149 PUPILS.THERE ARE 202 PUPILS AT THE JUNIOR SCHOOL,TAUGHT BY 8 TEACHERS,WITH A SECRETARY AND 1 ANCILLARY STAFF.FROM 11 TO 16 YEARS 879 PUPILS TRAVEL TO CHELLASTON SCHOOL BY BUS TO BE TAUGHT BY 50 TEACHERS,WITH 10 ANCILLARY WORKERS TO HELP.ALL 3 SCHOOLS PROVIDE HOT SCHOOL LUNCHES.ADULT EDUCATION IS MAINLY AT THE LEISURE CENTRE FOR 250 STUDENTS COVERINGS SUBJECTS LIKE DRESSMAKING,TYPING,SWIMMING,ART,YOGA AND KEEP FIT.YOUTH CLUB IS OPEN EVERY NIGHT FOR CHILDREN FROM 13 YEARS FOR POOL,VIDEO GAMES,MUSIC AND DANCING.
